qas.question: What does Nuestra Senora del Sagrado Corazon mean?

answers.text: Our Lady of the Sacred Heart

qas.question: What does Iglesia Punta Carretas mean?
Between what years was the Iglesia Punta Carretas built?
What stle was the Iglesia Punta Carretas built in?

context: Nuestra Señora del Sagrado Corazón ("<a0_0>Our Lady of the Sacred Heart<a0_0/>"), also known as Iglesia Punta Carretas ("<a1_0>Punta Carretas Church<a1_0/>"), was built <a2_0>between 1917 and 1927<a2_0/> in the <a3_0>Romanesque Revival style<a3_0/>. The church was originally part of the Order of Friars Minor Capuchin, but is presently in the parish of the Ecclesiastic Curia. Its location is at the corner of Solano García and José Ellauri. It has a nave and aisles. The roof has many vaults. During the construction of the Punta Carretas Shopping complex, major cracks developed in the structure of the church as a result of differential foundation settlement.
